Reviews.Title: Samsung Phone
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: Product works as expected.I bought it for a family member and they have been using without any complains. Good product.

Reviews.Title: Great simple flip phone!
Reviews.Author: Rusty
Reviews.Content: Used Motorola V3, V3i & V3x as my first flip phones.  Reception and transmission quality are better.  Simple and easy to use if you want a good talk phone.  Texting is more difficult.  Simple & Great phone.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: FasterMaster "Faster Master"
Reviews.Content: it's a great phone, great quality and best of all wife loves it, simple to use, no problems at all.

Reviews.Title: Information
Reviews.Author: Dusan
Reviews.Content: Unlocked Samsung S3600 Phone (Gold)-International VersionSamsung S3600i Unlocked Quad-Band Phone with 1.3 MP Camera, Bluetooth, FM Radio and microSD Card Slot--International Version with Warranty (Black)Can somebody tell what type of network i can use in this phone? AT&T;, VErizon, NET10 etc???Thank you guys :)

Reviews.Title: Well, the phone seems OK, but...
Reviews.Author: McDave
Reviews.Content: I received the phone and it seems to be working OK - the reception is good enough (I have only had the phone for a week so I haven't had a lot of experience with it) and I am told by people I talk to that they can hear me well and that the fidelity is good. I'd be much happier with the phone if I knew how to use its capabilities. It does not come with a User Guide; only a Quick Start guide. Therefor one is on one's own in figuring out how to enter names into the contacts list, how to use the camera, how to download and change ring tones, and all the other capabilities that one expects on a good cell phone these days, and which it seems this phone is capable of were one to have guidance on how to make use of them.

Reviews.Title: The item
Reviews.Author: Sembala Batchilly
Reviews.Content: The item is lake been use is like so old phone that they put in new box am not this phone

Reviews.Title: Nice look, nothing more.
Reviews.Author: robbie55
Reviews.Content: Very nice look. Charged it once. Can't charge again. Thank you Sh-tsung. May be phone, may be charger. I don't care. Must buy another one, not Samsung, for sure.Later.It was charger only. Five bucks out of pocket extra. I like this phone. Good. Nice sounds, nice screen. Very long battery stand by. Charge it every two weeks. Change rating for three stars. Why only three? One out for initial trouble, and one for.... it is just cheap phone. You got, what you pay for.
